forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain . Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 51F. WNW winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph.
